attributes.action: Children with Autism should all have a statement in mainstream schools.
attributes.additional_details: My son is struggling in a main stream schools he is 11 years old with Autism and ADHD he's on none stimulating medication, because He's on medication and manageable the school the school wont apply for a statment befor he was on medication they were considering it so basically I have to medicate him so they can manage him in school ,and he's very behind in learning he's is miss understood and punish for his mistakes he deserves to get extra help and surport .
attributes.background: Want more surport for Autistic children in main stream schools more training for teachers to understand the disability .
